responsibilities: Join a world-class team of machine learning researchers with an extensive track record in both academia and industry.
Research, develop, and apply new techniques in deep learning to advance industry-leading products.
Work with large-scale, real-world datasets ranging from banking transactions to large document collections.
Collaborate closely with the engineering team in a fast-paced startup environment and see research deployed in production with very short turnaround.
skills: Strong background in machine learning and deep learning.
Hands-on experience in software systems development.
Experience with one or more of Pytorch, Tensorflow, Jax, or comparable library.
Experience with Spark, SQL, or comparable database systems.
Experience using GPUs for accelerated deep learning training.
Familiarity with cloud computing systems like Azure or AWS.
analysis: The job involves working with a team of machine learning researchers and focuses on developing new techniques in deep learning. The responsibilities include working with large-scale datasets, which could potentially involve language data, but it is not explicitly stated. The skills required include a strong background in machine learning and deep learning, experience with libraries like Pytorch and Tensorflow, and using GPUs for accelerated training. These are common skills for working with deep learning models, which could include language models. However, there is no explicit mention of Generative AI or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus seems to be more on general machine learning and deep learning techniques rather than specifically on GenAI or LLMs.
